galedric.events

Class EventEmitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • galedric.events.EventEmitter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventEmitterInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AsyncEventEmitter

    public abstract class EventEmitter
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventEmitterInterface
    An event emitter. This class handles every bookkeeping related to EventListeners. This class uses a synchronous event delivery method. The emitter thread is blocked until event processing is completed.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean catchExceptions
      If TRUE, the onException() method will be called for each exception thrown during the delivery process.
      protected EventEmitterInterface emitter
      The emitter value used for events emitted by this emitter.
      protected java.util.Set<EventListener> listeners
      The set of every EventListeners bounds to this emitter.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EventEmitter()
      Creates a new EventEmitter.
      EventEmitter(EventEmitterInterface emitter)
      Creates a new EventEmitter with a specific emitter value for emitted events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(EventListener listener)
      Binds a listener to this emitter
      void emit(Event event)
      Emits an event.
      protected void onException(java.lang.Exception e)
      Extend this if you are interested in exceptions during the delivery process
      void removeListener(EventListener listener)
      Removes a listener from this emitter.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
